message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is significantly below my bottom line for this product. I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  This offer reflects the true value of what I'm offering.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $14,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
